author: samisa
msg: Fixed the problem of the message "deployment descripter not found"
comming up on the web page when  Apache web server (and so, Axis)
has no write access to the logs (or log directory).
Also Added "Welcome to Axis C++" as the title shown on web page.

author: tomj
msg: Fix bug 1372 - Default servlet mapping for AxisServlet breaks service names

Don't assume there will be a leading slash in path.
